attributes.additional_details:
Cancer Research UK inform's us all that tobacco use continues to result in 100,000 deaths each year in the UK.
They also inform us that 157,000 11-15 year olds become smokers each year in the UK...

To further help reduce the above statistics - save lives and be an example to the rest of the world, please petition the Government to bring in a law renaming cigarettes cancerettes.
Thank you for listening - and petitioning.
The Rt Revd Charles Mugleston
